attributes.action: Call for a General Election to the United Kingdom Electorate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This government lied at the last election that they would hold a referendum on the EU Constitution.

This government has run out of economic ideas and abandoned its principle, and should put the abandonment of the 10p lower tax rate to the electorate.

This government has ignored the elecotrates wishes or lied directly about on the Human Rights Act, Personal ID Documents, Regional Assemblies, Tuition Fees.

This Government continues to ignore the vacuum in the House of Lords.  This government refuses to try and address the inbalance brought to the English by way of devolution.

This government is subservant to the EU, America, China and Big Business.  It has made sure that gives no accountablitity to it's electoral masters.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
